title: Into the Woods
description: Written as part of the 'choose your own m/m story' challenge hosted by Goodreads' own M/M Romance Group. The story prompts for the author were: 1. the setting ~ an isolated town for retired Circus performers, who all have deep dark secrets2. some background to one of the main protags ~ one has a girlfriend who is pregnant with an undead baby, but he isn't sure if it's his, especially since he doesn't remember ever being undead...or heterosexual... 3. another character/s ~ killer kitten robots and a best friend/sidekick who has an urban legend for every situation4. a conflict ~ a science experiment resulting in carnivorous maple trees that can swim! 5. an object/phrase to be mentioned in the story somewhere ~ least fave Halloween treat - religious pamphlets from the weird family down the street
author: Anna Mayle
